goal.name: Clean Water and Sanitation
goal.full_title: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
goal.description: Goal 6 focuses on ensuring availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all. It addresses safe drinking water, sanitation, hygiene, water quality, water-use efficiency, integrated water resources management, and protecting water-related ecosystems.

targets.text: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all
By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all
By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals
By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors
By 2030, implement integrated water resources management at all levels
By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems
